div.p: Charter Arts is located in the heart of the arts and cultural district of South Bethlehem.
Students major in one of 7 artistic areas: dance, theatre, literary arts, production design, visual art, vocal or instrumental music.
Thank you to all of our Sponsors and donors who supported this year's Plan B 'Un-Gala' event!
Charter Arts offers a full complement of core courses at the College Preparatory (CP), Honors and Advanced Placement (AP) levels.
Faculty and students work together to make a difference in our school and our community.
Charter Arts produces close to 90 performances & exhibits each school year.

li.h2: Charter Arts is a 2018 National Blue Ribbon School
li.p: The U.S. Department of Education released its list of 349 schools in the nation to receive the coveted 2018 National Blue Ribbon award. Charter Arts is so proud to receive this prestigious honor.

li.h2: Thank you to our School Community!
li.p: Over the past month, the Charter Arts school community has come together to support each other through this extraordinary time. Thank you to faculty, staff, students, and families as we continue to get through this together!

Charter Arts is an audition-based public charter school. Any high school student, entering 9th, 10th, 11th or 12th grade, who resides in Pennsylvania, is eligible to audition. Auditions are by appointment only.

div.p: The Winter/Spring 2020 Performance & Exhibit Season at Charter Arts will be filled with outstanding shows and exhibits. In addition, there will be many community performances that take place in collaboration with our neighbors including: Godfrey Daniels, SteelStacks, Hotel Bethlehem and more!
